thought: The Slack action requires the 'blocksUi' parameter to be provided, even if empty. I will set 'blocksUi' to an empty string and provide all required parameters to avoid the error.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to send message to a channel.
Set 'text' to use the input json text field.
Set 'blocksUi' to empty string to satisfy required parameter.
Test Slack message sending with these parameters.
criticism: Previously, 'blocksUi' was missing causing the Slack action to fail. This fix should resolve the issue.

tool_input.comments: Send classification results to Slack channel #general with all required parameters, including empty blocksUi.

tool_output.error: input parameter is null, "blocksUi" for action_2. You should put something in it.
